title: A Day in the life of a child: introducing environmental action
creator_credit: Stephen Weingarth, Tim Cramer and Educational and Documentary Video Productions
brief_description: Filmed in Australia, this program combines acting, animation and real life environmental situations in homes, schools and communities. Demonstrates how young people can think and act in an environmentally friendly manner and have fun as well.
